Summary Note:
The RM met Alba Emma Gil at a yacht party in Madrid. They enjoyed a scenic cruise and discussed various investment strategies, which marked the beginning of a successful partnership.
Alba Emma Gil is a 66 year old and comes from Spain.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in her decision to join.
Family Background: Alba Emma Gil is currently divorced. Her children are named Martínez and Marta.
Education Background:
Alba earned her secondary school diploma from IES Ginés Martínez de Aranda Albacete in 1977.
After that, she went on to study at IESE Business School until 1983.
Occupation History:
Alba Emma Gil is a 66 year old retired Construction Company Owner from Spain. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Alba Emma Gil launched her career as a Property Manager at Realia Business S.A., where she gained valuable experience from 1982 to 1986.
In 1988, she moved to Metrovacesa S.A. to work as a Developer, applying her knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
At Metrovacesa S.A., she worked as a Construction Company Owner from 1991 till retirement, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 850000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She has flat located in Vigo, worth 920000 EUR.

In addition to her primary residence, she owns house in Toledo worth 1393000 EUR.

On top of that she inherited a beautiful condo in Madrid, which could be used as a weekend getaway. It is valued at 860000 EUR.
She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
